content: There are a number of places that refereince Practitioner but not PractitionerRole. The FMG is contemplating adding PractitionerRole to many of these locations. Committers are asked to review the list, discuss with their work groups and identify any concerns prior to next Wednesday's call. Full discussion is here: https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/9-committers/subject/Close.20out.20for.20R4

Is a single person applying all of the FMG approved PractitionerRole changes or is each WG committer expected to make the changes for their resources? Just confirming who owns next steps on this one. If it is each WG committer, then is Lloyd's co-chair email on 11/22 the correct list to be working from?

Hi Michelle - at the FMG meeting yesterday we agreed that FMG would do that to reduce the burden on committees - but when I re-read Lloyds email, I may has mis-read the list of elements to apply s only being the ones with committee approval. Seeking clarification on that & will get back to you. (Lloyd is on a well earned holiday at the moment)

Hi Michelle - Lloyd has confirmed that these are all to be applied - here's PC's list:

PC AdverseEvent.contributor
PC AdverseEvent.recorder
PC AllergyIntolerance.asserter
PC AllergyIntolerance.recorder
PC ClinicalImpression.assessor
PC Condition.recorder
PC Flag.author
PC Goal.expressedBy
PC Linkage.author
Also have resources from BR&R, CDS, FHIR-I. II, InM, MnM, Pharm, StrucDoc & OO to do if there are volunteers...

I'll take the CDS ones to start
what do you have left from StructDocs?
I can't get into the build site. but the element was DocumentReference.authenticator
that is done. I did that last week
I did Signature, DocumentReference, and ImagingStudy last week
